text:
Our dog isn't a picky eater, so he didn't mind switching from his normal Purina One lamb and rice to give Beneful a try. We've tried some other beef dog foods in the past and the end result (no pun intended) is usually a smelly gassy dog that has to go frequently. So I wasn't sure if we'd be in for more of the same when I decided to have him give this food a try. He's been eating it for a little over a week now and I'm very surprised that he's had no issues with it. He's been gobbling it up so I'd say that's a pretty good indicator that he likes it.

I do think the food bits are a bit large for him. He's a small dog (Pug/Jack mix) and I've noticed that it seems like he has to work a little harder to chew this food compared to his regular food.
